text: Gabriel Simion (born 29 May 1998 in Bucharest) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for FCSB.FCSB l-a cedat la Astra pe Gabriel Simion, deși Gigi Becali tocmai îl lăudase. gsp.ro == Statistics == ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" rowspan="2"|Club !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" rowspan="2"|Season !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|League !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Cup !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|League Cup !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Europe !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Other !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="3"|Total |- !
